Source.Name: dnscrypt-proxy
Source.Summary: A flexible DNS proxy, with support for encrypted DNS protocols.
Source.Description: A flexible DNS proxy, with support for modern encrypted DNS protocols such as DNSCrypt v2 and DNS-over-HTTPS.

Package.Summary: A flexible DNS proxy, with support for encrypted DNS protocols.
